error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '*' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 29
His profits were $40 because 20 * 0.5 = <<20*0.5=10>>10
He made $300 selling sunglasses because 10 x 30 = <<10*30=300>>300
His costs for the sunglasses were $260 because 300 - 10 = <<300-10=290>>290
The sunglasses cost him $26 each because 290 / 10 = <<290/10=29>>29
